docs.snippet: Two senior U.S. Republican senators asked the Trump administration on Monday to allow the sale of Lockheed Martin Corp. F-35 fighter jets to Taiwan, saying it would help it "remain a democracy" in the face of threats from China.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Republicans Press for F-35 Fighter Jet Sales to Taiwan Amid China Threat
headline.main: U.S. Republicans Press for F-35 Fighter Jet Sales to Taiwan Amid China Threat

docs.snippet: Our guide to stand-up, improv and variety shows happening this weekend and in the week ahead.

headline.main: 5 Comedy Shows to Catch in NYC This Weekend

docs.snippet: The Trump administration said Thursday that it ended special considerations to generally release pregnant women charged with being in the United States illegally while their cases wind through immigration court.

headline.print_headline: US Paves Way to Hold More Pregnant Women in Immigration Jail
headline.main: US Paves Way to Hold More Pregnant Women in Immigration Jail

docs.snippet: European missiles group MBDA has won a 400 million pound contract with the British government for its Brimstone air-to-surface missiles, MBDA said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: European Missiles Group MBDA Wins 400 Million Sterling UK Deal
headline.main: European Missiles Group MBDA Wins 400 Million Sterling UK Deal

docs.snippet: The choice of Mike Pompeo all but cements hard-line opposition to the idea of climate change at the highest levels of the United States government.

headline.print_headline: Pompeo, Trump’s Pick for Secretary of State, Is a ‘Great Climate Skeptic’
headline.main: Pompeo, Trump’s Pick for Secretary of State, Is a ‘Great Climate Skeptic’

docs.snippet: Thirty-four people said to be illegal immigrants were in custody on Wednesday after federal agents raided a "drop house" in Phoenix suspected of being a part of a human smuggling operation, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officials ...

headline.print_headline: 34 People From 3 Countries Detained in Arizona Immigration Raid
headline.main: 34 People From 3 Countries Detained in Arizona Immigration Raid

docs.snippet: The caravan of Central American migrants that angered U.S. President Donald Trump was sidelined at a sports field in southern Mexico with no means of reaching the border even as Trump tweeted another threat to Mexico Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Migrant Caravan, Raising Concerns in US, Halts in Mexico
headline.main: Migrant Caravan, Raising Concerns in US, Halts in Mexico

docs.snippet: Jurors recommend the death penalty Tuesday for a man who repeatedly entered the United States illegally before killing two Northern California deputies in a case that fueled the national immigration debate.

headline.print_headline: Death Penalty Recommended for Man Who Killed Deputies
headline.main: Death Penalty Recommended for Man Who Killed Deputies
